## IBaseRequest interface

A handier wrapper around a request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBaseRequest 
```

|  [protocol](./kassette.ibaserequest.protocol.md) | string | The protocol part of the URL, without the trailing <code>:</code> |
